rooms.description: Main entry area with reception counter, seating, and display of architectural elements following Vastu principles by aligning entrance in the east.
Spacious living area with modern amenities, large windows for natural light aligning to south direction per Vastu.
Adjacent to the living room, offers a modern dining space with seating arrangements and glass partitions.
Modern, compact kitchen design incorporating energy-efficient appliances and storage solutions.
Small, convertible space that can serve as a guest room or home office with adequate privacy.
Flexible workspace integrated into the living area to support modern work-from-home lifestyles.

openings.details: Wide entrance door with reinforced glass panels, aligned to harness morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
Large sliding doors that open into the garden and swimming pool area for enhanced connectivity.
Dedicated entrance to a two-car garage, ensuring smooth traffic flow from the street.
Elevated balcony providing panoramic views of the garden and swimming pool area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed for privacy and comfort.
Modern bathroom adjacent to master bedroom, incorporating water-efficient fixtures.

openings.details: Private balcony with seating area and garden view.
Large window offering natural light while maintaining privacy, oriented towards the north-east per Vastu suggestions.

additional_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool located in the garden area, designed for relaxation and exercise.
Well landscaped garden with native plants, outdoor seating areas, and walking paths.
Dedicated two-car garage located at the northern edge of the property with integrated storage and work area.
